languages.text: "Адептус Механикус почитают {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Он — земное воплощение Омниссии, вернувшее Человечество в свет божественной милости".

traits.locale_text: "Адептус Механикус почитают {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Он — земное воплощение Омниссии, вернувшее человечество в свет божественной милости и знаменовавшее конец Эры Раздора".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."
languages.original_text: "Адептус Механикус почитают {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Он — земное воплощение Омниссии, вернувшее Человечество в свет божественной милости".

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus worship {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}the Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of Omnissiah who brought Mankind back into the light of divine grace and spelled the end of the Age of Strife."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus worship {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}the Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of Omnissiah who brought Mankind back into the light of divine grace and spelled the end of the Age of Strife."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Mankind back into the light of divine grace and spelled the end of the Age of Strife."

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “机械修会也同样崇拜{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。欧姆尼塞亚的光芒，将赐予人类神圣的恩典，而帝皇便是欧姆尼塞亚在凡世的化身。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: “机械修会也同样崇拜{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。欧姆尼塞亚的光芒，将赐予人类神圣的恩典，而帝皇便是欧姆尼塞亚在凡世的化身。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El Adeptus Mechanicus adora al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Es la manifestación terrenal del Omnissiah, que trajo a la Humanidad a la luz de su gracia divina».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Mechanicus adora al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Es la manifestación terrenal del Omnissiah, que trajo a la Humanidad a la luz de su gracia divina».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「帝国技術局は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を崇拝する。主は人類を神の恩寵の光に導いた万機神の地上での具現なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を崇拝する。主は人類を神の恩寵の光に導いた万機神の地上での具現なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Adeptus Mechanicus verehrt den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}. Er ist die irdische Manifestation des Omnissiah, der die Menschheit in das Licht der göttlichen Gnade gehoben hat."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: "Der Adeptus Mechanicus verehrt den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}. Er ist die irdische Manifestation des Omnissiah, der die Menschheit in das Licht der göttlichen Gnade gehoben hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Mechanicus vénère l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Il est l'incarnation terrestre de l'Omnimessie et c'est grâce à Lui que l'humanité peut connaître la lumière de la grâce divine. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Mechanicus vénère l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Il est l'incarnation terrestre de l'Omnimessie et c'est grâce à Lui que l'humanité peut connaître la lumière de la grâce divine. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the Emperor. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} tapar. O, Hermesih'in dünyevi tezahürü olup İnsanlığa ilahi faziletin ışığını bahşetmiştir."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. He is the earthly manifestation of the Omnissiah who brought Humanity into the light of divine grace."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a tapar. O, Hermesih'in dünyevi tezahürüdür ve İnsanlığa ilahi faziletin ışığını O bahşetmiştir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
